the Eaten by Monsters music blog

Writing semi-coherently about new music since 2008. An award-winning, taste-making, discourse-shaping powerhouse (albeit in a very specific niche).

Thoughts about Toska, an EP by Broken Records.

Release Date: March, 2014

Record Label: Self-released

Broken Records trail their upcoming album with a new EP, Toska. Worth buying for the last track alone.
